name: Monitoring
description: Monitoring students' learning activities to improve teaching process
author: OpenLAP

name: Prediction
description: Predict students' knowledge and future performance based on his/her current activities and performance
author: OpenLAP

name: Recommendation
description: Help students decide what to do next by recommending them learning resources and learners to work with, based on their preferences and activities of other learners with similar preferences
author: OpenLAP

name: Assessment
description: Assess students' performance to improve learning process
author: OpenLAP

name: Self-Reflection
description: Support students and teachers in comparing data within the same course, across classes, or even across institutions to draw conclusions and reflect on the effectiveness of their learning or teaching practice
author: OpenLAP
